about_the_game:
Cardstock Cowboys: Weird West #1

Starter Pack Token Pack

Add a third dimension to your Weird West game with over 200 Cardstock Cowboys™! These heroes, scoundrels, and horrors are perfect for use with the Deadlands roleplaying game and the Boomtowns! accessory, or our completely free miniatures rules, High Noon!

Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

Archetypes

  • Blessed (4)
  • Brave (4)
  • Confederate Officer (1)
  • Confederate Soldier (1)
  • Cowboy (1)
  • Cowgirl (1)
  • Gambler (2)
  • Gunslinger (4)
  • Huckster (4)
  • Kid (2)
  • Law Dog (4)
  • Mad Scientist (4)
  • Man-in-Black (2)
  • Muckraker (4)
  • Pony Express Rider (2)
  • Prospector (2)
  • Saloon Gal (2)
  • Shaman (4)
  • Shyster (2)
  • Spy (2)
  • Texas Ranger (2)
  • Union Officer (1)
  • Union Soldier (1)
  • Woman-in-Black (2)

Critters

  • Bloody One (2)
  • Desert Thing (2)
  • Devil Bat (2)
  • Dust Devil (2)
  • Ghoul (4)
  • Ghoul King (1)
  • Gremlin (4)
  • Hangin' Judge (2)
  • Jackalope (1)
  • Los Diablos (1)
  • Maze Dragon (1)
  • Mojave Rattler (1)
  • Night Haunt (2)
  • Praire Tick (1)
  • The Revenant (1)
  • Tumbleweed (1)
  • Walking Dead 10)
  • Wall Crawler (2)
  • Wendigo (2)
  • Werewolf (2)

Groups

  • Bandit (8)
  • Cultist (8)
  • Desperado (8)
  • Indian Warrior (8)

Mounted

  • Mounted Bandit (4)
  • Mounted Blessed (2)
  • Mounted Brave (4)
  • Mounted Confederate Soldier (2)
  • Mounted Cowboy (1)
  • Mounted Cowgirl (1)
  • Mounted Desperado (4)
  • Mounted Gunslinger (4)
  • Mounted Huckster (2)
  • Mounted Kid (2)
  • Mounted Law Dog (2)
  • Mounted Mad Scientist (2)
  • Mounted Man-in-Black (1)
  • Mounted Muckraker (2)
  • Mounted Pony Express Rider (2)
  • Mounted Shaman (2)
  • Mounted Texas Ranger (2)
  • Mounted Union Soldier (2)
  • Mounted Woman-in-Black (1)

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Clemens G Meyer

Released on January 06, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
